media.caption: Nouvelle Terre: A Timeline of Despair

text.headline: The History of Nouvelle Terre
text.text: The tale of a world gone awry. Follow the key events that shaped this dystopian reality.

text.headline: The Great Divergence
text.text: The timeline of Nouvelle Terre diverges from the Old World in 1337, during the Hundred Years War. Here, France achieves a decisive victory, changing the course of history forever.

text.headline: Franco-German War
text.text: The war that shook Nouvelle Terre to its core, resulting in a stalemate and the unexpected revival of the Holy Roman Empire.

text.headline: Global Hunger Crisis
text.text: A worldwide famine sparks desperation among nations, pushing the world closer to the brink of another global war.

text.headline: The Propaganda Machine
text.text: During the war, both sides utilized propaganda to sway public opinion.
